name: They follow (BeniBebe)
description:
Made for the Godot Wild Jam #46. Escape from the ghosts as long as you can. If you survive 30 seconds, you'll unlock the next level. Only the windows download has been tested.

CONTROLS:

WASD -> move

lmb -> shoot the orb

rmb -> teleport to the orb (once it reaches its destination)

CREDITS:

Font: public pixel. https://www.dafont.com/es/public-pixel.font

Droning sound in the menu: https://freesound.org/people/Veiler/sounds/517846/

Song: Skip by Ketsa. https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Ketsa/night-vision/skip/
